body:
#About Us

We are a [FTC](http://www.usfirst.org/ftc) team based in Portland, Oregon. Our goal is to push this sport to its limits, both in technical and outreach elements. To this effect, we are prepared to bring a wild and challenging approach to the 2012-2013 FTC season.

#About FTC

[FTC](http://www.usfirst.org/ftc) is a program under [FIRST](http://www.usfirst.org) -- **F**or the **I**nspiration and **R**ecognition of **S**cience and **T**echnology -- which is devoted to teaching high school students about science and technology fields and career. I is a _coopertition_, where teams work both with and against each other to create small robots to solve a yearly challenge.

#About this Season

We really don't know what the challenge will be like this year. We are eagerly awaiting the release on September 7th.
name: E=MC Sqirreled
